item.description: The last few weeks (when we haven't had the conference room) it has been really crowded at Borders, so I am going to South Station food court tonight at 6 (upstairs from the food) to check it out. Maybe if some people go to each site we will solve the crowding problem. I will not stick around past 630 if no one RSVPs or shows by then.
item.name: Tuesday meetup experiment - South Station
